title: Great location near public transportation! East Perimeter Pointe Apartments
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2.5', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1018 sq ft', 'Rent: $1475/Month', 'Terms: 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also have easy access to nearby Atlanta Transit for your commuting needs.", "There's simply no reason not to make these singular Decatur, GA Apartments your new home.", 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Cable Ready', '● Cozy Fireplaces', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Island Kitchens', '● Linen Closet', '● Smoke Free', '● Storage Units', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '● Hardwood Flooring', '● Newly Renovated Apartments', '● Patio or Balcony Options', '● Roommate Floor Plans', '● Townhomes Available', '● Upgraded Lighting Package', '● Washer & Dryer Connections', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● 24 Hour Availability', '● Business Center', '● Common Area Wi-Fi', '● Community/Onsite Parking', '● Indoor Pool', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Organized Activities', '● Picnic Area', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Storage Space', '● Electronic Rent Payment', '● Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '● Monthly Resident Events', '● On-site Maintenance Management', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Public Transportation', '● Racquetball Court(s)', '● Resident Referral Bonuses', '● Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '5DC885803A93434E']
